text: @cnnbrk Let’s do it!! Americans need to get back to work. Staying at home watching the Coronavirus 24/7 is making people paranoid.

domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: CNN Newsroom
entity.description: "CNN Newsroom" presents the day's headlines and breaking stories live from CNN headquarters in Atlanta. The rotating cast of anchors and contributors includes Carol Costello, Kyra Phillips, Suzanne Malveaux, Brooke Baldwin, Don Lemon, Randi Kaye and Fredricka Whitfield.
